Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Each document, spreadsheet, or file being worked on constitutes a case, which allows tracking of activities over their editing/write/saving lifecycle.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case identification is based on the Window title in the system log. Each unique title corresponds to a logical separation of user tasks.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Email handling is identified as a separate case using the subject from the 'Action' field, grouping actions like Open, Reply, and Send for each specific email interaction.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Activity naming combines the action type with its application-specific context, such as 'Edit Document' for typing in Microsoft Word or 'Compose Email Response' for typing in Chrome.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Cross-referencing timestamps ensures that cases accurately include all events up to the CLOSE event or any SWITCH event that transitions to a new task.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Switch events are interpreted as transitions from the originating case rather than the destination, ensuring a clear end to a current task before starting the next.
